cards.title: Ammo Damaged
cards.text: Discard all Ammo Upgrade Cards from this Tank. +1 Damage for each card discarded.

cards.title: Equipment Damaged
cards.text: Target player discards one Upgrade Card on their choice from this Tank.

cards.title: Crew Injured
cards.text: Target player discards one Crew Card of their choice from this Tank.

cards.title: Engine Damaged
cards.text: This Tank can only make one Move per turn.

cards.title: Turret Jammed
cards.text: This tank gains the Assult Gun rule.

cards.title: Bailed Out
cards.text: This Tank cannot More or Shoot.

cards.title: Engine Fire
cards.text: At the end of the Repair step, this Tank takes 1 Damage. If this is this Tanks last Hit Point, it is immediately Destroyed.

cards.title: Optics Damaged
cards.text: This Tank has -2[firepower]. Discard after this Tank Shoots.
